Class ArithExprNode

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

      ArithExprNode(TermNode term, TermTailNode termTail)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArithExprNode

        public ArithExprNode(TermNode term,
             TermTailNode termTail)
        Construct a new arithmetic expression node. Arithmetic expressions consist of a term and a term-tail. Arithmetic expressions are a sum of terms.
        Parameters:
        term - The first term in the expression
        termTail - The term tail, to which subsequent terms in the expression are attached.

    • Method Detail

      • getVal

        public double getVal(ProgState progState)
              throws DCRuntimeErrorException
        Evaluates the arithmetic expression using the current symbol table and returns its value.
        Parameters:
        progState - The current program state
        Returns:
        The value of the evaluated arithmetic expression.
        Throws:
        DCRuntimeErrorException - Thrown in the event of a runtime error (for instance, if a division by zero occurs)

      • parseArithExpr

        public static ArithExprNode parseArithExpr(TokenReader tokenReader)
                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                           DCSyntaxErrorException
        Reads source code tokens from tokenReader and parses them into an arithmetic expression. When this method is called a term is imminently expected to appear in the input stream.
        Parameters:
        tokenReader -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        DCSyntaxErrorException
